titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to streamline the deployment of telecommunications or broadband service facilities in public rights-of-way and the rights-of-way of railroad carriers, and for other purposes.

A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to streamline the deployment of telecommunications or broadband service facilities in public rights-of-way and the rights-of-way of railroad carriers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
